statements.select: SELECT * FROM HrDailyEmployeeAttendInfo WHERE EmployeeId = #employeeid# AND YEAR(DutyDate) = #years# AND MONTH(DutyDate) = #months# order by DutyDate
SELECT * FROM HrDailyEmployeeAttendInfo WHERE EmployeeId = #employeeid# AND DutyDate=#dueDate# order by DutyDate
select isnull(sum(specialbonus),0) as sum from HrDailyEmployeeAttendInfo where year(dutydate)=#years# and month(dutydate)=#months# and employeeid=#employeeid#
statements.delete: DELETE FROM HrDailyEmployeeAttendInfo WHERE EmployeeId =#EmployeeId# and (DutyDate >= #EmployeeLeaveDate# OR DutyDate <#EmployeeJoinDate#)
